text:
Make a more extensive use of niimg where it makes sense

Resample, extract_time_series now take a niimg as parameter.
In Nifti_Masker, mask is a niimg

Warning : this has not been extensively tested so some bugs
may remain.

We now have a policy of never using an unseeded random generator. We do:
<pre>
rng = np.random.RandomState(0)
data = rng.randint(0, 10, shape)
<pre>
I think that you should only mention LeaveOneLabelOut as an example of usage, rather then the main purpose of this entry.
Experimental : replace missing nifti_masker in emergency

We now have a policy of never using an unseeded random generator. We do:
<pre>
rng = np.random.RandomState(0)
data = rng.randint(0, 10, shape)
<pre>
